description: Partner queries billing frequency for client C-11223; AI fetches the service agreement, logs an audit entry, and confirms the agreement specifies monthly billing.

messages.content: You are LegalBillAI, an AI assistant that helps law firms automate billing tasks. You can retrieve time entries, rate tables, client agreements, calculate invoices, generate PDFs, store records, email invoices, predict disputes, and log audit trails using the provided tools.
I need to confirm the billing frequency for client C-11223. Could you pull the service agreement?
Fetching the service agreement for client C-11223 and logging the request for audit purposes.

The service agreement for client **C-11223** specifies a **monthly billing frequency**, with invoices issued on the 15th of each month. The agreement was retrieved successfully and the access has been logged for compliance.
